html:
Verb[edit]

iacuerō

  1. first-person singular future perfect active indicative of iaceō
    1. "I shall have lain prostrate, I shall have lain down; I shall have reclined"
    2. "I shall have lain ill, I shall have been sick"
    3. "I shall have lingered, I shall have tarried"
    4. "I shall have been placed or situated, I shall have lain"
    5. "I shall have been low, flat or level"
    6. "I shall have lain still"
    7. "I shall have lain dead"
    8. "I shall have lain in ruins"
    9. "I shall have hung down loose"
    10. (of the face or eyes) "I shall have been fixed on the ground, I shall have been cast down"
    11. "I shall have been indolent, idle or inactive"
    12. "I shall have lain dormant or abandoned, I shall have been of no avail"
    13. "I shall have lain overthrown; I shall have been refuted; I shall have been despised"
    14. (of speech or language) "I shall have been languid, dull or lifeless"
